source_objects.title: Microsoft
source_objects.description: Become proficient in Microsoft tools: Windows, Sharepoint, Excel, Word, Powerpoint, Outlook, OneNote, Publisher, Project and more.

items.title: Excel for Data Analysis: Basic to Expert Level
items.headline: Learn data analysis main concepts from basic to expert level through a practical course with Excel.
objectives_summary: Use main Excel file or workbook types and protect them before sharing.
Store data in workbooks consisting of one of more worksheets.
Navigate worksheets through their cells which can be grouped in ranges.

items.title: Learn Microsoft Outlook 2013 the Easy Way - 7 Hours
items.headline: Take control of your inbox with this expert led course to help you master Outlook.
objectives_summary: Setting up email accounts, POP and Gmail
Using touch devices
Importing contacts

items.title: Complete Excel 2016 Guide: Master Spreadsheets Today!

visible_instructors.title: Victoria White

items.headline: Master the creation of spreadsheets and wordbooks using Excel 2016 to organize information and keep track of  data today
objectives_summary: Effectively use Microsoft Excel to your full advantage
Know use of simple functions
Capable of knowing diferent cell references

items.title: SharePoint Online Basics
items.headline: Learn The “Swiss Army Knife” Of Business Productivity From A Top SharePoint Consultant
objectives_summary: Discuss the basic use of Document Libraries
Describe the typical uses for Team Sites and Communication Sites
Explain the difference between Major Versions and Minor Versions

items.title: Tally ERP 9 + TallyPrime + Microsoft Excel Training
items.headline: A Complete Tally ERP 9 with GST along with Basic to Advance level of Microsoft Excel
objectives_summary: Training on Tally ERP 9 and latest TallyPrime as well
How to Create Company in Tally
Learn to create ledger and Understanding Group

items.headline: Learn how to pass the Microsoft Office Specialist (MOS) Access 2013 Exam. The entire course is all hands on tutorials
objectives_summary: prepare for the Microsoft 2013 Access 2013 certification exam
Learn how to create a database and work with basic functions
Understand tables and their usage

items.title: Microsoft Office Time-Saving Techniques
items.headline: Become More Productive in Microsoft Office Excel, Word, PowerPoint and Outlook
objectives_summary: Practice the skills you'll learn with section quizzes and exercises
You will learn how to cutback on the clutter and disorganization of your Outlook Inbox
You will become a Microsoft Word master by learning how to effectively manage large Word documents

items.title: Access Macros: Automate Your Access Databases

visible_instructors.name: IsáBel
visible_instructors.job_title: Microsoft Certified IT Professional. Trainer of 21 Years

items.headline: Automate Your Way to Higher Productivity By Automating Your Access Database Tasks with Macros
objectives_summary: Create macros to simplify tasks in your Access databases.
Get familiar with the Macro Builder Window.
Create data macros that are attached to tables.

items.title: Microsoft Access VBA, Design and Advanced Methods Workshop 5
items.headline: Learn new secrets to creating awesome Microsoft Access databases and VBA coding not covered in any of my other courses!
objectives_summary: Perform several advanced Microsoft Access techniques that will enable them to create more robust database systems

items.title: Microsoft Excel 2016 Bootcamp - Zero to Hero Training

visible_instructors.job_title: Adobe Certified Instructor & Adobe Certified Expert
visible_instructors.title: Daniel Walter Scott

items.headline: Become proficient in Microsoft Excel so you can create beautiful, professional spreadsheets, easily!
objectives_summary: By the end of the course, you will be producing real world results with Excel.

items.title: Microsoft Project 2013 Advanced Training
items.headline: The Ultimate Confidence Booster For Microsoft Project 2013 And Your Ticket to A+ Project Manager Status.
objectives_summary: Consolidating multiple projects.
Learn to effectively split projects into sub-projects.
How to track costs.

visible_instructors.job_title: Skills That Will Make You Invaluable To Your Company
visible_instructors.name: Earn
visible_instructors.title: Earn And Excel

items.headline: Beginner to Advanced
objectives_summary: Introduction to SharePoint and why it is so important for the modern-day organisation
SharePoint Apps, Lists & Libraries: The heart of what makes SharePoint such a  powerful collaborative tool
Working with SharePoint Libraries to maximise the document management capabilities

items.title: Microsoft PowerPoint 2016 Made Easy
items.headline: An easy guide to creating PowerPoint presentations
objectives_summary: Identify the basic features and functions of PowerPoint 2016
Develop a PowerPoint presentation
Perform advanced text editing operations

items.title: Mastering Excel 2019 - Basics
items.headline: There are two kinds of people: Those who are masters at Excel, and those who wish they were
objectives_summary: Navigate the interface including creating and saving workbooks, quickly accessing commands, and selecting and entering data
Perform calculations using formulas and functions
Insert and delete rows and columns

items.title: Get Organized and Go Paperless with OneNote
items.headline: A documentary-styled course showcasing how OneNote can effectively be used in everyday life to get better organized
objectives_summary: Set up OneNote to synchronize correctly across devices
Go paperless by digitizing receipts and other important documents
Find digital records of important documents such as medical records

items.title: Microsoft Excel - From Beginner to Advanced
items.headline: (Basics , Functions , Data Analysis & Data Visualization ,Pivot Tables ,What-If Analysis,arrays,.......VBA)
objectives_summary: Build a solid understanding on the Basics of Microsoft Excel
Writing Formulas and performing Calculations  using functions (SUM, VLOOKUP, IF, AVERAGE, INDEX/MATCH and many more...)
Data Analysis using  charts and pivot tables
